name: 2976 Faux Fur Lined Leather Chelsea Boots - Kids

features:
Warm, hardwearing and winter-proof: WarmWair is soft, insulated lining crafted from carefully selected materials
The 2976 is the rugged Docs take on the classic Chelsea boot. Manufactured since the 70s
Republic WP is a textured leather with waxy, oily finish and medium pull-up effect. Care with Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam
Upper: 100% Leather
Inner: 100% Textile
Sole: 100% PVC
Material: A Crazy Horse leather with a waxy, oily finish and medium pull-up effect.
Construction: The sole is cemented to the upper.
